name: 英文寫作與研究方法（一）
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: The course is designed to enable students the following background knowledge and professional skills: (1) To introduce the learners to the concept of ‘ research’; (2) To enable them to understand the stages of research; (3) To familiarize the learners to the procedures involved in research; (4) To introduce them to the conventions of research papers; (5) To familiarize them the techniques and conventions of research documentation.
goals: There are two aims of this course: (1) to conduct their own small scale research, and (2) the main aim is to get them familiarized with techniques and methods of selecting topics, developing questions, collecting and analyzing data, preparing the research paper. The ultimate goal is for the students to produce a presentable research paper.
syllabus:
Week 01: Orientation Meeting

     Unit I: Process of research     

Week 02: Organize to Begin Your Project

Week 03: Familiarize yourself with good models

Week 04: Select a Subject

Week 05: Explore Your Subject

Week 06: Narrow the Subject into a Manageable Topic

Week 07: State the Objective

Week 08: Make a Preliminary Bibliography

     Unit II: Data Collection

Week 09: Collect Your Information

Week 10: Analyze Your Information

Week 11: Collect More Information

Week 12: Arriving at the title

Week 13: Prepare a Tentative Working Outline

Week 14: Plagiarism and Academic Ethics

     Unit III: The Outline

Week 15: Take Notes

Week 16 :Prepare a Final Outline

Week 17: Skills of Oral Presentation

Week 18: Recapitulation
